SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Board
class that define the living room
Bookshelf
class that define the bookshelf as a matrix of Tile
ChatController
Controller for the chat scene
ChatReplyMessage
Chat message sent from the server to the client as a reply to a chat request message
ChatRequestMessage
Message sent from the client to the server to request a chat message
Cli
class that represents the interface view via command line interface
Client
abstract class represents the generic client used to communicate with the server, every type of connection implements this class
ClientApp
main of the client application
ClientController
class used from client side, it is the mediator between the network and a generic view (cli or gui)
ClientHandler
interface used to handle clients: the RMIClientHandler and SocketClientHandler implements it
ColorCli
enum used for coloring the cli
CommonDifferentColumns
override of the method check of the abstract class CommonGoalCard
CommonDifferentRows
override of the method check of the abstract class CommonGoalCard
CommonEightSameType
override of the method check of the abstract class CommonGoalCard
CommonFourCorners
override of the method check of the abstract class CommonGoalCard
CommonFourGroups
override of the method check of the abstract class CommonGoalCard
CommonFourGroupsTest
This class test the CommonFourGroups methods
CommonGoalCard
abstract class that defines a common goal card
CommonGoalCardScore
class to manage the scores of the 2 common goal cards
CommonGoalCompleteMessage
message to notify that a player completed the common goal card
CommonIncreasingHeight
override of the method check of the abstract class CommonGoalCard
CommonMaxThreeColumns
override of the method check of the abstract class CommonGoalCard
CommonMaxThreeRows
override of the method check of the abstract class CommonGoalCard
CommonSameDiagonal
override of the method check of the abstract class CommonGoalCard
CommonSixGroups
override of the method check of the abstract class CommonGoalCard
CommonTwoSquares
override of the method check of the abstract class CommonGoalCard
CommonXSameType
override of the method check of the abstract class CommonGoalCard
ConnectionController
controller of the connection panel for the client connection
Controller
 
CreditsController
controller of the credits panel
DisconnectionMessage
message sent to client to notify the disconnection of a player
EndController
controller of the end panel, it shows the final score of the game and the winner
ErrorMessage
message used to notify an error to the client
ErrorType
 
Game
class that defines a game
GameController
class that represents the controller of the game
GameControllerScene
This class is the controller of the game scene It contains all the methods that are called by the view to update the scene
GameState
enum class which represents the state of the game
GenericMessage
message used to show a generic text during the game
Gui
Override of the View class for the GUI Every method of the View are implemented in this class for the GUI
InfoGameMessage
message used to send to the client information about the game (players and number)
InsertTilesRequestMessage
message sent to the client to insert the selected tiles into the bookshelf
LobbyController
controller of the lobby panel, where the players wait for the game to start
LoginReplyMessage
message sent to client to notify if the login is successful or not
LoginRequestMessage
message used to communicate the selected nickname
MainGui
main of the Gui application
MenuController
controller of the menu panel
Message
abstract message class which must be extended by each concrete message type server and clients communicate using this generic type of message
MessageType
enum that contains all the message type used to communicate between server and clients
NameController
controller of the name panel
NumPlayersReplyMessage
message used to send to server the chosen number of players
NumPlayersRequestMessage
message used to ask the client to choose the number of players in the game
Observable
class that defines observable
Observer
observer interface that supports the method update
OrderReplyMessage
message used to send the selected order for the tiles
OrderRequestMessage
message used to ask the order of the tiles inserting in the bookshelf
Persistence
class used to handle the persistence of the game, used for save, restore and delete a game saved in a file
PersonalGoalCard
class that defines a personal goal card
PersonalGoalCardType
enum class which contains the types of the personal goal cards
PingMessage
message used to keep the connection alive
Player
class that defines a player
popUpController
Controller for the pop-up window
PositionReplyMessage
message used to communicate the selected position column to insert the tiles in the bookshelf
RMIClient
class that represents an RMI client implementation
RMIClientHandler
class to handle the RMI connection on server side
RMIInterface
remote interface used by RMIStub and RMISkeleton to handle the RMI connection
RMIServer
class that implements the RMI server, as a thread
RMISkeleton
class that implements the remote interface, to communicate from the server to the client
RMIStub
class that implements the remote interface, to communicate from the client to the server
SceneController
Class that controls every change of scenes, panels and observers
ScoresMessage
message used to show the final ranking scores of the players
SelectPlayersController
Controller class for the SelectPlayer panel This panel is shown only at the first player Panel creating for the choice of the number of player in the game
SelectTileRequestMessage
message sent to client to request to select tiles from the board
Server
class represents the server of the game and handles the connection with the clients
ServerApp
main of the server application
ShowBoardMessage
message sent to the client to show the board
ShowBookshelfMessage
message to show the client his bookshelf
ShowCommonCardsMessage
message used to show the common goal cards of the game
ShowCommonScoresMessage
 
ShowPersonalCardMessage
message used to show the personal goal card
SocketClient
class that represents a socket client implementation
SocketClientHandler
socket implementation of the ClientHandler interface
SocketServer
class that handles the socket connection with a new socket client
Tile
class that define a tile
TilesReplyMessage
message used to notify the selected tiles from the board
TileType
enum class which represents the type of tile
TurnController
class that manages turn in the game
TurnState
enum class which represents the possible states of a turn
View
interface used to define a generic view
ViewObservable
abstract class extended by the CLI and GUI classes which must be observed by the controller
ViewObserver
interface implemented by the observer ClientController class on the view classes
VirtualView
class used as view for the controller, it hides the real view and the network to the controller
WinnerPlayerMessage
message to notify the winner player of the game
